page.title: 20Hundred Acre School,Streetly
page.content: The children who contributed their work for this block all came from {Hundred Acre Wood First School}who at short notice took on the whole block. But you wont find the school. any longer. It was closed in July l985 under a reorganisation scheme. It was located at the end of Valentine Close and had been opened in l966. Throughout its life it gave a sound educational background and a lot of happiness to many children and their teachers. An H.M.I. inspection in 1979 described it as "a good school". The parents were always willing to help and the 12 kilometre squares of the block were surveyed by families and a teacher. I owe my thanks to these families: McFarlane, Breen, Smith, Bird, Kelly, Davies, Hanson, While, & Caine.{Tom Walsh. {
